infotexts.entitydescription.nightgoggles: Standart Gece Görüşü Gözlüğü. Pil ile çalışır.
infotexts.entitydescription.organscalpel_eyes: Göz ameliyatlarında kullanılması için özelleştirilmiş bir neşter.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyespoon: Nakil gözlerin bedenlerden çıkarılabilmesi geliştirilmiş ileri düzey bir cihaz. İnsan üzerinde işlevsiz.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyeglasses: Görme bozukluklarını geçiçi olarak önleyebilen çağ dışı bir cihaz.
infotexts.entitydescription.aviatorglasses: Uçan araç kumandanlarının taktığı antik bir aksesuar. Özgüveni ciddi derecede arttırıyor.
infotexts.entitydescription.muscleconnectors: Göz kası bağlantılarını kurar, göz jelinden sonra sinir bağlantılarından önce uygulanır.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyegel: Göz yuvalarını nemlendirir, kas bağlayıcılarından önce kullanılır.
infotexts.entitydescription.nerveconnectors: Göz sinirlerini beyine bağlar, kas bağlayıcılarından sonra uygulanır.
infotexts.entitydescription.eyelens: Katarakt ameliyatlarında göz lensinin çıkarılmasından sonra uygulanır.
infotexts.entitydescription.eye_laser_tool: Lazer göz ameliyatlarında kullanılan kompakt bir cihaz. İleri seviye yetenek gerektirir.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes: Right out of a human's skull. Used for transplants.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_monste: Right out of a monster's skull. Not great for seeing things, but stylish at parties.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_terror: An eye-like object that is unbeknownst to humanity. Proceed with caution.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_husk: Right out of a husk's skull. Cannot be damaged by water, and has a chance to give the patient husk infection.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_bionic: A metal, much more resilient eye, made for transplantation. Can't be damaged by oxygen deprivation. Slightly increases vision quality.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_night: A pair of eyes, that comes with night vision implants. Can't be turned off on demand.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_infrar: A pair of eyes with infrared implants. Slightly improves combat skill and vision in dark.
infotexts.entitydescription.transplant_eyes_plasti: A pair of "eyes", not much better than being blind. While the its hard to see clear with them, at least they look fashionable.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.noeye: The patient's eyes have been surgically removed, with empty, red holes taking their place. Horrific.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyedamage: The patient's eyes look flat, and they have trouble seeing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyeshock: The patient's immune system did not accept the eye, and is attacking it instead. Eye removal or immunosuppressants are required to stop it.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyedrop: The patient's eye healing rate has increased.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyeone: The patient has lost all vision in one of the eyes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyesdead: The patient has lost all vision and their eyes are unresponsive.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyesickness: The patient has trouble seeing, likely because of a recent eye transplant. Should wear off in time.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyecataract: The patient's eyes look cloudy, and their vision is blurred. Surgery advised.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyemuscle: Muscle connectors are attached to the eye holes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyegell: Eye gel is applied to the eye holes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyepopped: The eyeballs have popped outside the skull and are hanging.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.corneaincision: An incision into the cornea has been made.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.emulsification: The eye lens has been removed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.lasereyesurgery: Patient's eyes are rapidly healing due to recent laser surgery.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyenight: The patient has night vision eyes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.eyeterror: You feel a comforting sense of bloodlust and strength. You are more resilient. You are alive. You must kill. KAR EN TUK
